title: tillaana (dheem tatara)
sahitya:
dhIm tattara tAni nAdru drudru dhIm tadara tAni udana dhIm dhIm

tanana 

(dhIm)



anupallavi



nadhru dru tOm drudru dhIm tatara tAni dhIm tajham jham

kiTata tajhaNuta kiTatari

takataNam kiTata takadhimi kiTatari dittillAna drudru tillAna

drudru tAna drudrudru 

(dhIm)



caraNam



ninnu kOriyunna nAdupai sannutAnga nI dayayuncarA

pannaga shayana nA vinnapamuvini nannu brOva rAmadAsa sannuta



solkaTTu



tAm takiTataka takadhimi risanidha tajhaNu rigapa kiTa dhasariga

pA

takiTa sarigarisa tajham jham kiTata ditlAm kiTata pamagari

tadhingiNa tOm 

(dhIm)
